name: Peter
description: Nature lover and hiking enthusiast. Excited to meet like-minded people!
reviews: James is great company and very knowledgeable about sustainability.
Had amazing conversations with James about eco-friendly practices.

name: Mary
description: Art enthusiast who loves exploring creativity and emotions through art.
reviews: Mary brings a calming presence and is very lovely.

name: Ava
description: Art enthusiast who loves exploring creativity and emotions through art.
reviews: Ava brings a calming presence and is very open-minded.
Loved working on projects together, she has an eye for detail.

name: Cheryl
description: Hi everyone, I love reading and going for an adventure!
reviews: Cheryl was a very friendly and caring fellow resident. Very easy going and easy to talk to!
Friendly and nice to chat along. Very fun to be with

name: Sophia
description: Art enthusiast who loves exploring creativity and emotions through art.
reviews: Sophia brings a calming presence and is very open-minded.
Loved working on projects together, she has an eye for detail.

name: Kelly
description: Art therapy enthusiast, exploring emotions and self-expression.
reviews: Kelly is patient and insightful. Great to discuss art therapy techniques.
Wonderful to be around; she brings thoughtful perspectives.
